responses: Welcome to RailEnqueryBot! To know how to use reply 'help'.
Hope to see you again and help you better

To know about the route of a train reply with 'Route of train (train number) or simply route (train number)
,TO check PNR status - Send 'PNR status of (PNR Number) or just 'PNR (PNR Number)
TO check route of a train- Send 'Route of train (train number) or simply route (train number) '
TO check PNR status - Send 'PNR status of (PNR Number) or just 'PNR (PNR Number)
